mapper.select: SELECT id, name, created_by AS createdBy, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM chat_forestfull.chat_room ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT cp.member_id AS memberId, cp.room_id AS roomId, cp.display_name AS displayName, cp.profile_image AS profileImage FROM chat_forestfull.chat_participant cp WHERE cp.room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_forestfull.chat_participant (room_id, member_id, display_name, profile_image) SELECT #{roomId}, m.id, m.display_name, m.profile_image FROM chat_forestfull.member m WHERE m.id = #{memberId}
